original_text: But another servant perhaps does not know what his master wants him to do. So he does wrong things. The master will punish him because he did those wrong things. But he will not hit him as much. If God gives a lot to somebody, he will want a lot back in return. And God will want much more from the person to whom he has given authority over much more.
korean_text: 알지 못하고 맞을 일을 행한 종은 적게 맞으리라 무릇 많이 받은 자에게는 많이 요구할 것이요 많이 맡은 자에게는 많이 달라 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But another servant perhaps does not know
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 종은 어쩌면 모를 것이다

sentences.original_text: what his master wants him to do
because he did those wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 잘못된 일들을 했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: But he will not hit him as much
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그를 그렇게 많이 치지는 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: If God gives a lot to somebody
he will want a lot back in return
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 많은 것을 돌려받기를 원하실 것이다

sentences.original_text: And God will want much more
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님은 훨씬 더 많은 것을 원하실 것이다

sentences.original_text: from the person to whom he has given authority
